title: (x) "going solo" grunge copperplate script - BreastBomb {Angel}
content:
Please can anybody help me with identifying this font?  
I think I would really like to use this or something similar for my wedding invitations.

Any other suggestions anyone has would be greatfully appreciated!!

Thanks,

asp

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 4.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060121/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%204_12.png) | 9.19 KB |

 [‹ Very Square Font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060121/http:/typophile.com/node/33824 "Go to previous forum topic") [Can anyone recommend something close to this inline sans? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060121/http:/typophile.com/node/33810 "Go to next forum topic")
author: asp

comments.content: The sample is [BreastBomb](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060121/http:/www.dafont.com/breastbomb.font?text=going+solo). [Velvet](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060121/http:/www.dafont.com/velvet.font?text=going+solo) is similar in style.
thank you - you are clearly a genius!!

IMHO, I’d recommend using a regular script font, maybe one with contextual alternates, then applying the distressing afterwards so that matching letters don’t look the same.

- Lex

Some of the best grunge scripts are [Eduardo Recife](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060121/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eduardo%252BRecife)’s: [Nars](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/misprinted/nars/), [Porcelain and Selfish](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212060121/http:/www.misprintedtype.com/v3/fonts.php). Let me know what you think. ;^)

Sorry about the late reply here!  
Thanks all very much for your help and suggestions.

Lex, I think that you are right about perhaps using a regular font and then tweaking it all afters - there are several elements of the Breastbomb font that I would end up changing, so i figure I am better off just working from something else a little more “tight”.

Bald Condensed, thanks so much for the heads up on Eduardo Recife - very helpful and I really enjoyed looking at the site. I like both Porcelain and Selfish. Nars is cool too, but (annoying) my invites have to be my Mum friendly and I don’t think she’d be so up for it.

Much appreciated!
